trans-unit.source: Establishes an inline editor for the updating of property values.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값을 업데이트 하기 위한 인라인 편집기를 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class can hold a single <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>: one for an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> editor.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 단일 보유할 수 있는 <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>:에 대 한 하나는 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode>편집기.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Inline editing refers to the entering of property values into a text box or similar control as opposed to setting the value by choosing it from a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 인라인 편집 이란 텍스트 상자 또는 드롭다운 메뉴에서 선택 하 여 값을 설정 하는 대신 이와 비슷한 컨트롤에 속성 값을 입력 하는 것을 의미 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> class as the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.InlineEditorTemplate*>.
The inline editor <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> used to create the new property value editor.
trans-unit.target: 인라인 편집기 <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> 을 새 속성 값 편집기를 만드는 데 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> be used to change a property value.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> 를 특정 지정 하기 <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> 속성 값을 변경 하는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.

Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> to designate that a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type be used to change a property value.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> 를 특정 지정 하기 <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> 형식은 속성 값을 변경 하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> type.
Gets or sets the InlineEditorTemplate, the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used for an inline editor.
trans-unit.target: InlineEditorTemplate를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> 인라인 편집기에 사용 되는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> has its <xref:System.Windows.DataContext> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that represents an inline editor.
